text: (ye log) tauba karane vaale ibaadat guzaar (khuda kee) hamdo sana (taareef) karane vaale (us kee raah mein) saphar karane vaale rookoou karane vaale sajada karane vaale nek kaam ka hukm karane vaale aur bure kaam se rokane vaale aur khuda kee (muqarrar kee huee) hado ko nigaah rakhane vaale hain aur (ai rasool) un momineen ko (behisht kee) khushakhabaree de do
